abstract: The Giants game starts at 1 p.m. Sunday, and it appears that Cablevision subscribers will not be able to watch.
snippet: The Giants game starts at 1 p.m. Sunday, and it appears that Cablevision subscribers will not be able to watch.
lead_paragraph: 4:21 p.m. | Updated  The contract dispute between Fox and Cablevision appears likely to drag into a third day.

headline.main: Giants Game in the Balance in Cablevision-Fox Fight

byline.original: By Brian Stelter and Bill Carter
